about_the_game:
Taking retro to a whole new level with hentai ball reflecting action. Designed with simplicity for 1 handed play. Time for a taster, Direct Sarah, pick your difficulty and get directing.



Use your vibrator to deflect the ball and get it past your opponent. But just because you win, doesn't mean you "win".

You need to hit clapperboards with the ball to actually direct your porn star! - They will do exactly as directed.


-Fully voiced
-Fully animated
-Character bio's

You can even Invite your friend to join you, give you an extra hand!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Direct-Her contains explicit sexual acts, with explicit voices/sounds, including mummy/daddy fetishes along with various cosplay/BDSM orientated content. All characters depicted are 18 or over.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not designed for 4:3 and 5:4 Monitors.
